div.p: Oki! Welcome to the Heart Butte School where we value our student’s education and our Amskapi Pikuni culture. I would like to take this opportunity to welcome you to visit our school at any time. We strive to provide a very well-rounded education to our students that is infused with solid instruction and Pikuni culture.
Our school is a Trauma Informed school that helps our students understand some of the issues that stand before us and how to be successful in the face of adversity.

We, at Heart Butte, are home to some of the most culturally rich people on the Blackfeet Reservation and take pride in that fact and will continue to strive forward to utilize our culture to be successful! In order to succeed we need to know who we are and where we come from.
The 2019 schedules for both Warrior Football and Lady Warrior Volleyball have been released. Both can be downloaded in .pdf format from the below links.
